subtitle: psychedelics are very interesting and I
think that over the next 10 years we're
going to see them becoming more and more
accepted in the mainstream especially
for all of their therapeutic benefits
including how they help people overcome
depression and anxiety and solve other
mental health issues too but the weird
thing about them is that they're like a
double-edged sword if used improperly
they can cause the very same problems
that they can solve it's funny though
because then they can also be used to
help solve the very problem that they
caused in the first place like if you
have a bad mushroom trip that leaves you
in a rough spot if you have another one
you can correct that original imbalance
super interesting so be careful and
journey
safely
